QuestData.Title: Farmhand Freedom
QuestData.Description: Those Ordo yaungol are working my farmhands to death! It just ain't right.$B$BPlease, $c, save them before it's too late.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 12 Farmstead Slaves by killing Ordo Overseers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Look, $g mister : lady;, I don't mean to be telling you your business, but I can still see a lot of my farmhands still out there.
QuestData.RewardText: Now ain't you just the thing?$B$BThough, I guess it's not fair to force these here workers to stay with us, now that we don't have much work for 'em...
